remarks.format: ## Remarks 是建立的結構描述的基本建置組塊。The is the fundamental building block for creating the schema of a . 您藉由新增一或多個建置結構描述物件至。You build the schema by adding one or more objects to the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 新增至 DataTable 的資料行](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md). 每個已經屬性，可決定的資料種類包含。Each has a property that determines the kind of data the contains. 比方說，您可以限制的資料型別至整數、 字串或小數位數。For example, you can restrict the data type to integers, or strings, or decimals. 因為所包含的資料通常會合併回其原始的資料來源，您必須符合那些在資料來源的資料類型。Because data that is contained by the is typically merged back into its original data source, you must match the data types to those in the data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ADO.NET 中的資料類型對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-type-mappings-in-ado-net.md)。For more information, see [Data Type Mappings in ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-type-mappings-in-ado-net.md). 這類的屬性， ，和放置項目和更新的資料，以協助確保資料完整性的限制。Properties such as , , and put restrictions on the entry and updating of data, thereby helping to guarantee data integrity. 您也可以使用， ，和屬性以控制自動的資料產生。You can also use the , , and properties to control automatic data generation. 如需詳細資訊資料行，請參閱[建立自動遞增資料行](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md)。For more information about columns, see [Creating AutoIncrement Columns](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-autoincrement-columns.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 定義主索引鍵](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 您也要確定中的值藉由建立都是唯一並將它加入至的要所屬。You can also make sure that values in a are unique by creating a and adding it to the of the to which the belongs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [DataTable 條件約束](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md)。For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md). 若要建立之間的關聯物件建立物件，並將它加入至的。To create a relation between objects, create a object and add it to the of a . 您可以使用屬性物件來計算資料行中的值，或建立彙總的資料行。You can use the property of the object to calculate the values in a column, or create an aggregate column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 建立運算式資料行](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md)。For more information, see [Creating Expression Columns](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-expression-columns.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立azure-regions物件。The following example creates a with several objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此資料行的類型不是 Int16、 Int32 或 Int64 當設定這個屬性，屬性會強制轉型成 Int32。If the type of this column is not Int16, Int32, or Int64 when this property is set, the property is coerced to Int32. 如果這是計算資料行，則會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if this is a computed column. 屬性設定。The property is set. 只有在本專欄中，當加入資料行集合中，加入的資料列的值等於預設值，會使用遞增的值。The incremented value is used only if the row's value for this column, when added to the columns collection, is equal to the default value. 您可以建立新的資料列使用屬性類別，並傳入值的陣列。You can create a new row using the property of the class and passing in an array of values. 這是與資料行的潛在問題及其設定為`true`，因為其值會自動產生。This is a potential problem for a column with its set to `true`, because its value is generated automatically. 若要使用屬性中，位置`null`在陣列中的資料行的位置。To use the property, place `null` in the column's position in the array. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 屬性類別。For more information, see the property of the class. 如果資料行的類型是或是，將無法運作。If the type of the column is or , will not work. 請改用 Int16 或 Int32。Use Int16 or Int32 instead. 如果資料行的類型是或是，將僅部分運作。If the type of the column is or , will only partially work. 請改用 Int64 或小數位數。Use Int64 or Decimal instead. 當值加入至目前的值，會隱藏溢位檢查。When the value is added to the current value, the overflow check is suppressed. ## Examples 下列範例會設定， ，和屬性。The following example sets the , , and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何當對應會儲存為 XML 文件使用方法。The property determines how a is mapped when a is saved as an XML document using the method. 例如，如果名為"customerID，"並將其屬性設定為`MappingType.Element`，資料行的值將會產生下列 XML:For example, if a is named "customerID," and its property is set to `MappingType.Element`, the column value will produce the following XML: ``` ALFKI ...... 12345 ALFKI ...... ``` 不過，如果相同的資料行對應至`MappingType.Attribute`，則會產生下列 XML:However, if the same column is mapped to `MappingType.Attribute`, the following XML is produced: ``` ...... More orders for this customer ``` 使用建構函式，其中包含`type`引數來指定如何當對應其會轉換為 XML 文件。Use the constructor that contains the `type` argument to specify how the is mapped when its is transformed to an XML document. 屬性會對應到建構函式引數`type`。The property corresponds to the constructor argument `type`. ## Examples 下列範例會設定型別屬性時，新。The following example sets the type property of new . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.ColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.ColumnMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.ColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.ColumnMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行所儲存的資料類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of data stored in the column.

value.span: A物件，表示資料行資料類型。

span.span: A object that represents the column data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定值是保證正確建立和更新的資料來源中的資料非常重要。Setting the value is very important to guaranteeing the correct creation and updating of data in a data source. 屬性支援下列的基底.NET Framework 資料型別：The property supports the following base .NET Framework data types: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 以及下列的陣列型別：as well as the following array type: - `Byte[]` 將資料儲存在資料行之後變更此屬性開始時，會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated when changing this property after the column has begun storing data. 如果設定為`true`內容，才能設定屬性，而且您嘗試將類型設定為整數型別以外的項目，會產生例外狀況。If is set to `true` before setting the property, and you try to set the type to anything except an integer type, an exception is generated. > [!NOTE] > 資料類型的資料行`Byte[]`需要特殊的處理方式，在某些情況下，因為不同於基底的.NET Framework 資料類型，它是參考資料類型。A column of data type `Byte[]` requires special treatment in certain cases since, unlike the base .NET Framework data types, it is a reference data type. 如果資料類型的資料行`Byte[]`做為，或或是金鑰，資料行值的任何變更都必須包括指派`Byte[]`個別具現化資料行值`Byte[]`物件。If a column of data type `Byte[]` is used as a , or as a or key for a , any change to the column value must involve assigning the `Byte[]` column value to a separately instantiated `Byte[]` object. 這項指派才可觸發排序、 篩選和主要金鑰的作業所使用的內部索引更新。This assignment is required to trigger the update of the internal indexes used by sorting, filtering, and primary key operations. 以下範例就是說明這種情況：This is illustrated by the following example: ```csharp byte[] columnValue = (byte[])myDataTable.Rows[0][0]; byte[] newValue = (byte[])columnValue.Clone(); newValue[1] = 2; myDataTable.Rows[0][0] = newValue; ``` > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以定義為資料類型的基底.NET Framework 資料型別以外的資料行和`Byte[]`，這類資料會被視為使用者定義的型別，有下列的使用量限制。Although it is possible to define a column as data type other than the base .NET Framework data types and `Byte[]`, such a column will be treated as a user-defined type, subject to the following usage restrictions. (如需有關使用者定義類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立和 Using User-Defined 類型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ec0266d2-7e5b-47e4-938a-85ac9d04fa40)。)(For more information on user-defined types, see [Creating and Using User-Defined Types](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ec0266d2-7e5b-47e4-938a-85ac9d04fa40).) - 資料行不能是一部份或運算式。The column cannot be part of a or expression. - 如果資料行做，或若是，必須將它視為不可變動的欄位; 一旦加入至資料表，都不可以變更資料行的資料。If the column is used as a , or as a or for a , it must be treated as an immutable field; the column data must not be changed once it has been added to the table. - 其可以只設定為`MappingType.Element`。Its can be only set to `MappingType.Element`. - 資料行的資料類型必須的實作必須標記為類別，以及是否需要實作或介面。The class that implements the column's data type must be must be marked with the , and if necessary implement the or interface. - 有限支援變更追蹤。Support for change tracking is limited. 若要利用類別的變更追蹤機制，實作的資料行資料類型的類別必須實作介面，或取代負責通知當資料行值已修改，可能藉由呼叫資料列或資料行值物件指派給個別具現化的資料行值物件。To utilize the class' change tracking mechanism, the class that implements the column's data type must either implement the interface, or take over the responsibility for informing the when the column value has been modified, either by calling on the row or by assigning the column value object to a separately instantiated column value object. ## Examples 下列範例會將數個資料類型的資料行，然後將一個資料列加入至資料表。The following example adds columns of several data types to a , and then adds one row to the table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列會加入後便無法修改，除了從修改和，反之亦然。The cannot be modified after rows are added to a , except for modifying from and or vice-versa. 從修改`UnspecifiedLocal`至`Unspecified`並允許這兩個選項之間的差異只在還原序列化期間並不會影響儲存體，反之亦然。The modification from `UnspecifiedLocal` to `Unspecified` and vice-versa is allowed as the difference between these two options is only during serialization and does not affect the storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是會自動指派給資料行的值時建立 (例如，日期和時間所建立。A default value is the value that is automatically assigned to the column when a is created (for example, the date and time when the was created. 當設為 true，可以有沒有預設值。When is set to true, there can be no default value. 您可以建立新的資料列使用屬性類別，然後將值的陣列。You can create a new row using the property of the class and passing the method an array of values. 這是預設值的資料行可能有問題，因為其值會自動產生。This is a potential problem for a column with a default value because its value is generated automatically. 若要使用屬性與這類資料行中，放置`null`在陣列中的資料行的位置。To use the property with such a column, place `null` in the column's position in the array. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數個具有不同的資料類型，並設定適當的物件預設每個資料行的值。The following example creates several objects that have different data types, and sets appropriate default values to each column. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumn.DefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumn.DefaultValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An expression to calculate the value of a column, or create an aggregate column.

value.span: 運算式的傳回型別由的資料行。

span.span: The return type of an expression is determined by the of the column.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 其中一種用法屬性是要建立導出資料行。One use of the property is to create calculated columns. 例如，若要計算的稅額值，單價乘以特定區域的稅率。For example, to calculate a tax value, the unit price is multiplied by a tax rate of a specific region. 稅率不同地區，因為它是不可能在資料行中放入單一的稅率相反地，使用計算值屬性下, 一節中的 Visual Basic 程式碼所示：Because tax rates vary from region to region, it would be impossible to put a single tax rate in a column; instead, the value is calculated using the property, as shown in the Visual Basic code in the following section: DataSet1.Tables("Products").Columns("tax").Expression = "UnitPrice \* 0.086"DataSet1.Tables("Products").Columns("tax").Expression = "UnitPrice \* 0.086" 第二種用途是建立彙總的資料行。A second use is to create an aggregate column. 類似於導出值，執行彙總作業根據一組完整的資料列中。Similar to a calculated value, an aggregate performs an operation based on the complete set of rows in the . 簡單的範例是計算集合中傳回的資料列數目。A simple example is to count the number of rows returned in the set. 這是您用來計算特定的銷售人員、 完成的交易數目，此 Visual Basic 程式碼所示的方法：This is the method you would use to count the number of transactions completed by a particular salesperson, as shown in this Visual Basic code: ```vb DataSet1.Tables("Orders").Columns("OrderCount").Expression = "Count(OrderID)" ``` ## 運算式語法Expression Syntax 當您建立運算式時，使用來參考資料行的屬性。When you create an expression, use the property to refer to columns. 例如，如果運算式會是一個資料行是"UnitPrice"，且另一個的"Quantity"，，如下所示：For example, if the for one column is "UnitPrice", and another "Quantity", the expression would be as follows: "UnitPrice \* Quantity""UnitPrice \* Quantity" > [!NOTE] > 如果資料行運算式中使用，即稱為對該資料行中的相依性運算式。If a column is used in an expression, then the expression is said to have a dependency on that column. 如果重新命名或移除相依的資料行，則會擲不回任何例外狀況。If a dependent column is renamed or removed, no exception is thrown. 存取已中斷的運算式資料行時，便會擲回例外狀況。An exception will be thrown when the now-broken expression column is accessed. 當您建立篩選運算式時，括住單引號的字串：When you create an expression for a filter, enclose strings with single quotation marks: "LastName = 'Jones'""LastName = 'Jones'" 如果資料行名稱包含任何非英數字元開頭是數字或符合 （不區分大小） 與任何下列的保留字，它需要特殊處理，下列段落中所述。If a column name contains any non-alphanumeric characters or starts with a digit or matches (case-insensitively) any of the following reserved words, it requires special handling, as described in the following paragraphs. 和And 介於Between 子系Child FalseFalse InIn 為Is 類似Like 否Not NullNull 或Or 父代Parent TrueTrue 如果資料行名稱符合上述條件的其中一個，則必須包裝在任一方括號或有"'"（抑音符號） 括住。If a column name satisfies one of the above conditions, it must be wrapped in either square brackets or the "\`" (grave accent) quotes. 比方說，若要使用名為"資料行 #"在運算式中的資料行，您可以撰寫可能是"[資料行 #] 」:For example, to use a column named "Column#" in an expression, you would write either "[Column#]": 總計 \* [資料行 #]Total \* [Column#] or "\`Column#\`":or "\`Column#\`": 總計 \*\`資料行 #'Total \* \`Column#\` 如果資料行名稱括在方括號中，則任何 ']' 和'\\' 個字元 （但不是含任何其他字元） 中必須逸出反斜線加 (「\\") 字元。If the column name is enclosed in square brackets then any ']' and '\\' characters (but not any other characters) in it must be escaped by prepending them with the backslash ("\\") character. 如果資料行名稱加上抑音符號字元它必須不包含任何抑音符號字元。If the column name is enclosed in grave accent characters then it must not contain any grave accent characters in it. 例如，名為資料行 」 資料行 []\\"會被寫入：For example, a column named "Column[]\\" would be written: Total \* [Column[\\]\\\\]Total \* [Column[\\]\\\\] 或or 總計 \*\`資料行]\\`Total \* \`Column[]\\` ## 使用者定義的值User-Defined Values 使用者定義的值可能會在運算式內使用具有資料行值進行比較。User-defined values may be used within expressions to be compared with column values. 字串值應該括在單引號 （和字串值中的每個單引號字元必須加以另一個單引號字元的逸出字元）。String values should be enclosed within single quotation marks (and each single quotation character in a string value has to be escaped by prepending it with another single quotation character). 日期值都必須加井字號 （#） 或資料提供者為基礎的單一引號 （'） 內。Date values should be enclosed within pound signs (#) or single quotes (') based on the data provider. 小數位數和科學記號標記法是允許為數值。Decimals and scientific notation are permissible for numeric values. 例如: For example: "FirstName = 'John'""FirstName = 'John'" 「 價格 < = 50.00""Price <= 50.00" 「 Birthdate < #1/31/82 # 」"Birthdate < #1/31/82#" 包含列舉值的資料行，將值轉換成整數資料類型。For columns that contain enumeration values, cast the value to an integer data type. 例如: For example: 「 EnumColumn = 5""EnumColumn = 5" ## 剖析的常值運算式Parsing Literal Expressions 所有的常值運算式必須以文化特性而異的地區設定。All literal expressions must be expressed in the invariant culture locale. 當`DataSet`剖析，並將常值的運算式，它一律會使用文化特性而異，不目前的文化特性。When `DataSet` parses and converts literal expressions, it always uses the invariant culture, not the current culture. 單引號周圍的值時，會識別字串常值。String literals are identified when there are single quotes surrounding the value. 例如：For example: ' John''John' `Boolean` 常值為 true 和 false;它們不加引號運算式中。`Boolean` literals are true and false; they are not quoted in expressions. `Integer` 常值 [+-]？[0-9] + 會被視為`System.Int32`，`System.Int64`或`System.Double`。`Integer` literals [+-]?[0-9]+ are treated as `System.Int32`, `System.Int64` or `System.Double`. `System.Double` 可能會遺失有效位數，取決於大小的數目為何。`System.Double` can lose precision depending on how large the number is. 例如，如果常值中的數字是 2147483650，`DataSet`會先嘗試剖析數字以`Int32`。For example, if the number in the literal is 2147483650, `DataSet` will first attempt to parse the number as an `Int32`. 這將會失敗，因為數目太大。This will not succeed because the number is too large. 在此情況下`DataSet`將會剖析數字以`Int64`，這將會成功。In this case `DataSet` will parse the number as an `Int64`, which will succeed. 如果常值的數目大於最大值的 Int64`DataSet`常值的使用將會剖析`Double`。If the literal was a number larger than the maximum value of an Int64, `DataSet` will parse the literal using `Double`. 使用科學記號標記法，例如 4.42372E 的實數常值-30，會使用剖析`System.Double`。Real literals using scientific notation, such as 4.42372E-30, are parsed using `System.Double`. 科學記號標記法，如果沒有，但有小數點時，實際的常值會被視為`System.Decimal`。Real literals without scientific notation, but with a decimal point, are treated as `System.Decimal`. 如果數目超過支援的最大或最小值`System.Decimal`，然後將它剖析為`System.Double`。If the number exceeds the maximum or minimum values supported by `System.Decimal`, then it is parsed as a `System.Double`. 例如: For example: 142526.144524 會轉換成`Decimal`。142526.144524 will be converted to a `Decimal`. 345262.78036719560925667 會被視為`Double`。345262.78036719560925667 will be treated as a `Double`. ## 運算子Operators 允許使用布林值 AND、 OR 和 NOT 運算子串連。Concatenation is allowed using Boolean AND, OR, and NOT operators. 您可以使用括號群組子句，並強制執行優先順序。You can use parentheses to group clauses and force precedence. AND 運算子的優先順序，高於其他運算子。The AND operator has precedence over other operators. 例如：For example: (LastName = 'Smith' 或 LastName = 'Jones')與 FirstName = 'John'(LastName = 'Smith' OR LastName = 'Jones') AND FirstName = 'John' 當您建立比較運算式時，可以使用下列運算子：When you create comparison expressions, the following operators are allowed: \< \> \<= \>= <> = ININ LIKELIKE 在運算式中也支援下列的算術運算子：The following arithmetic operators are also supported in expressions: \+ （加法）\+ (addition) \- (減法)\- (subtraction) \* (multiplication)\* (multiplication) / （除法）/ (division) %（模數）% (modulus) ## 字串運算子String Operators 若要串連字串，請使用 + 字元。To concatenate a string, use the + character. 值屬性類別可讓您判斷字串比較是否區分大小寫。The value of the property of the class determines whether string comparisons are case-sensitive. 不過，您可以覆寫與該值屬性類別。However, you can override that value with the property of the class. ## 萬用字元Wildcard Characters 同時 \*，%可交換使用 LIKE 比較中的萬用字元。Both the \* and % can be used interchangeably for wildcard characters in a LIKE comparison. 如果 LIKE 子句中的字串包含 \* 或 %，這些字元應該加上括號 ([])。If the string in a LIKE clause contains a \* or %, those characters should be enclosed in brackets ([]). 如果方括號是子句中，每個括號字元應該加上方括號 （針對範例 [[] 或 []]）。If a bracket is in the clause, each bracket character should be enclosed in brackets (for example [[] or []]). 開始和結束的模式，或結尾的模式，或在模式開頭允許萬用字元。A wildcard is allowed at the start and end of a pattern, or at the end of a pattern, or at the start of a pattern. 例如: For example: "ItemName 例如 '\* 產品\*' 」"ItemName LIKE '\*product\*'" "ItemName 例如 '\* 產品' 」"ItemName LIKE '\*product'" "ItemName LIKE ' 產品 \*'""ItemName LIKE 'product\*'" 在字串當中不允許萬用字元。Wildcard characters are not allowed in the middle of a string. 例如，' t \* xt' 不允許。For example, 'te\*xt' is not allowed. ## 參考的父/子關聯性Parent/Child Relation Referencing 父資料表可能在運算式中參考的資料行名稱前面加上`Parent`。A parent table may be referenced in an expression by prepending the column name with `Parent`. 例如，`Parent.Price`參考的父資料表的資料行名為`Price`。For example, the `Parent.Price` references the parent table's column named `Price`. 當子系具有一個以上的父資料列，請使用 Parent(RelationName)。ColumnName。When a child has more than one parent row, use Parent(RelationName).ColumnName. 比方說，Parent(RelationName)。價格會參考名為 Price 透過關聯性的父資料表的資料行。For example, the Parent(RelationName).Price references the parent table's column named Price via the relation. 子資料表中的資料行可能在運算式中參考的資料行名稱前面加上`Child`。A column in a child table may be referenced in an expression by prepending the column name with `Child`. 不過，因為父子關聯性可能會傳回多個資料列，您必須包含參考子資料行在彙總函式。However, because child relationships may return multiple rows, you must include the reference to the child column in an aggregate function. 例如，`Sum(Child.Price)`會傳回名為資料行的總和`Price`子資料表中。For example, `Sum(Child.Price)` would return the sum of the column named `Price` in the child table. 如果資料表有一個以上的子系，語法是： `Child(RelationName)`。If a table has more than one child, the syntax is: `Child(RelationName)`. 比方說，如果資料表有兩個名為的子資料表`Customers`並`Orders`，而物件名為`Customers2Orders`，該參考，如下所示為：For example, if a table has two child tables named `Customers` and `Orders`, and the object is named `Customers2Orders`, the reference would be as follows: Avg(Child(Customers2Orders).Quantity)Avg(Child(Customers2Orders).Quantity) ## 彙總Aggregates 支援下列彙總類型：The following aggregate types are supported: Sum (Sum)Sum (Sum) Avg （平均）Avg (Average) 最小值 （最低要求）Min (Minimum) 最大 （最大值）Max (Maximum) 計數 （計數）Count (Count) Stdev 函數 （統計標準差）StDev (Statistical standard deviation) Var （統計變異數）。Var (Statistical variance). 彙總通常會執行沿著關聯性。Aggregates are ordinarily performed along relationships. 使用稍早所列的函式和子資料表資料行的其中一個父子式關聯性參考先前討論中所述，以建立彙總的運算式。Create an aggregate expression by using one of the functions listed earlier and a child table column as detailed in Parent/Child Relation Referencing that was discussed earlier. 例如: For example: Avg(Child.Price)Avg(Child.Price) Avg(Child(Orders2Details).Price)Avg(Child(Orders2Details).Price) 彙總也可以透過單一資料表上執行。An aggregate can also be performed on a single table. 例如，若要建立資料行中的數字的摘要名為 「 價格 」:For example, to create a summary of figures in a column named "Price": Sum(Price)Sum(Price) > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用單一資料表建立彙總時，會有任何群組的功能。If you use a single table to create an aggregate, there would be no group-by functionality. 相反地，所有資料列會顯示資料行中的相同的值。Instead, all rows would display the same value in the column. 如果資料表沒有任何資料列，彙總函式會傳回`null`。If a table has no rows, the aggregate functions will return `null`. 資料類型的類型一律檢查來判斷資料行屬性。Data types can always be determined by examining the property of a column. 您也可以轉換使用 Convert 函式，在下一節中所顯示的資料類型。You can also convert data types using the Convert function, shown in the following section. 彙總只能套用至單一資料行和任何其他的運算式可用於彙總。An aggregate can only be applied to a single column and no other expressions can be used inside the aggregate. ## 函式Functions 也支援下列功能：The following functions are also supported: `CONVERT` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|將特定的運算式轉換為指定的.NET Framework 型別。Converts particular expression to a specified .NET Framework Type.| |語法Syntax|Convert(`expression`, `type`)Convert(`expression`, `type`)| |引數Arguments|`expression` --要轉換的運算式。`expression` -- The expression to convert.

`type` --值轉換為.NET Framework 型別。`type` -- The .NET Framework type to which the value will be converted.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Convert(total, 'System.Int32')"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Convert(total, 'System.Int32')" 所有轉換都都有效，但有下列例外狀況：`Boolean`可以轉型，來回`Byte`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `String`與其本身只。All conversions are valid with the following exceptions: `Boolean` can be coerced to and from `Byte`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `String` and itself only. `Char` 可以轉型，來回`Int32`， `UInt32`， `String`，與本身只。`Char` can be coerced to and from `Int32`, `UInt32`, `String`, and itself only. `DateTime` 可以轉型，來回`String`與本身只。`DateTime` can be coerced to and from `String` and itself only. `TimeSpan` 可以轉型，來回`String`與本身只。`TimeSpan` can be coerced to and from `String` and itself only. `LEN` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|取得字串的長度Gets the length of a string| |語法Syntax|LEN(`expression`)LEN(`expression`)| |引數Arguments|`expression` --要評估的字串。`expression` -- The string to be evaluated.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Len(ItemName)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="Len(ItemName)" `ISNULL` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|已檢查的運算式或取代值，請檢查運算式並傳回。Checks an expression and either returns the checked expression or a replacement value.| |語法Syntax|ISNULL(`expression`, `replacementvalue`)ISNULL(`expression`, `replacementvalue`)| |引數Arguments|`expression` 若要檢查--運算式。`expression` -- The expression to check.

`replacementvalue` --如果運算式`null`，`replacementvalue`會傳回。`replacementvalue` -- If expression is `null`, `replacementvalue` is returned.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression="IsNull(price, -1)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression="IsNull(price, -1)" `IIF` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|取得其中一個值，根據邏輯運算式的結果。Gets one of two values depending on the result of a logical expression.| |語法Syntax|IIF(`expr`, `truepart`, `falsepart`)IIF(`expr`, `truepart`, `falsepart`)| |引數Arguments|`expr` --要評估的運算式。`expr` -- The expression to evaluate.

`truepart` --運算式為 true 時要傳回的值。`truepart` -- The value to return if the expression is true.

`falsepart` --運算式為 false 時要傳回的值。`falsepart` -- The value to return if the expression is false.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "IIF(total>1000, 'expensive', 'dear')Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "IIF(total>1000, 'expensive', 'dear') `TRIM` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|移除所有開頭和尾端空白的字元，例如 \r、 \n、 \t，' 'Removes all leading and trailing blank characters like \r, \n, \t, ' '| |語法Syntax|TRIM(`expression`)TRIM(`expression`)| |引數Arguments|`expression` --要修剪的運算式。`expression` -- The expression to trim.| `SUBSTRING` ||| |-|-| |描述Description|取得指定的長度，從字串中指定的點開始子的字串。Gets a sub-string of a specified length, starting at a specified point in the string.| |語法Syntax|子字串 (`expression`， `start`， `length`)SUBSTRING(`expression`, `start`, `length`)| |引數Arguments|`expression` --來源字串的子字串。`expression` -- The source string for the substring.

`start` -指定子字串的開始位置的整數。`start` -- Integer that specifies where the substring starts.

`length` -指定的子字串長度的整數。`length` -- Integer that specifies the length of the substring.| Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "SUBSTRING(phone, 7, 8)"Example: myDataColumn.Expression = "SUBSTRING(phone, 7, 8)" > [!NOTE] > 您可以重設null 值或空字串指派給屬性。You can reset the property by assigning it a null value or empty string. 如果運算式資料行上設定的預設值，所有先前已填滿的資料列都會指派之後的預設值屬性重設。If a default value is set on the expression column, all previously filled rows are assigned the default value after the property is reset. ## Examples 下列範例會建立三個資料行中的。The following example creates three columns in a . 第二個和第三個資料行包含的運算式;第二個計算使用變數稅率的稅額和第三個將計算的結果加入至第一個資料行的值。The second and third columns contain expressions; the second calculates tax using a variable tax rate, and the third adds the result of the calculation to the value of the first column. 產生的資料表會顯示在控制項。The resulting table is displayed in a control.
